social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.desc: Join the giant conversation happening in the social media stratosphere! You can also subscribe to our blog's RSS,watch some of our online videos,and connect with us on the various networks. We'd love to meet you!

list.title: TriNet HR Blog
list.desc: We blog about HR issues affecting small business, management best practices and Entrepreneurship

list.desc: Get connected with some of the TriNet team via our company page on LinkedIn.

list.title: Wikipedia

best_practices.title: Best Practices
best_practices.desc: TriNet is dedicated to enabling our client companies to grow and develop their most important resource - their people. We're offering exclusive programs to help educate and inspire, including webinars on a range of HR topics and leadership practices.

headers.title: HR Strategy Webinar Series
headers.desc: This series of one-hour webinars provides insight into optimizing HR's contribution to the core business strategy.

headers.title: TriNet Executive Insider eNewsletter
headers.desc: This exclusive publication for TriNet clients provides insights and information to help you manage your human capital.

headers.title: TriNet Extreme Leadership Series with Steve Farber
headers.desc: We partnered with best-selling business author Steve Farber in an industry-leading thought leadership program entrepreneurs.

support.title: Support
support.heading: Contact TriNet
support.suggestion: You can also submit a case for your questions or concerns.
support.statement1_first: If you need help with payroll,benefits,or HR issues at TriNet,please send an email to
support.statement1_last: A corporate HR representative will respond to your request.
support.statement2_Part1: If you need IT assistance, please submit a North Star case.Go to the Intranet Home page.Under Tools & Resources,
support.statement2_Part2: click Add a North Star Case.Enter your contact information and a detailed description of the issue, then assign the case to the IT-Helpdesk Provider Group.
